text: Partition-based T/O protocol is fast if: — The DBMS knows what partitions the txn needs before it starts. — Most (if not all) txns onlyfiéed to access a single partition. Multi-partition txns causes partitions to be idle while txn executes. | SREE ETE se E O CMU Database Systems - 18 Timestamp Ordering Concurrency Control (Fall 2018)
